[[Image:Rosby Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Rosby on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Rosby''' is a settlement in [[the Crownlands]], consisting of a castle and a surrounding town. It is the seat of [[House Rosby]], a vassal house holding fealty to [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]]. The castle is located north of [[King's Landing]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/kings-landing/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, King's Landing entry]</ref><ref name="Viewers Guide">[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/kings-landing/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, King's Landing entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Rosby is surrounded by a town of daub and wattle huts. It sits on the road from King's Landing to [[Duskendale]] and is surrounded by rich farms, which grow a lot of the food that helps feed the capital.
